main event: A witness observed an unidentified object comparable to a flame with a lot of smoke for 1-2 minutes in Moorehead, Minnesota on 29 October 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as having a flame-like appearance and emitting a lot of smoke., The course of the object was ENE., The total duration of the sighting is assumed to include time notifying officers., No decay of light or sound was reported during the sighting., The incident was recorded as possibly being a meteor or aircraft.
sighted object: an object comparable to a flame and smoke
witness description: The witness was unable to provide a detailed description but noted the object's similarities to a flame.
